page.title: 01N.W.Calne in Rural Wiltshire
page.content: { { { The following 20 pages contain information covering a section of rural Wiltshire, including Studley, Wick Hill, Bremhill, Ratford, and the western area of the town of Calne. The River Marden and the disused Wilts and Berks Canal run through the area,and the old railway track from Chippenham,now the Marden Nature Trail. The farming is mostly intensely managed grassland and dairy cattle. The A.4 road runs through the area to Chippenham,the M.4.and points West.Also the A3102 to Lyneham and Oxford.
